ValidationRule.description: When User Select Outstation Cheque of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then not entering data in Cheque/DD Amount (Rs.)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'Outstation Cheque') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c,'Rupees') , ISBLANK( Cheque_DD_Amount_Rs__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting Outstation Cheque of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,Cheque/DD Amount (Rs.) cann't be blank.
